actions.text: On agreeing to the Mollohan amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 256 (Roll no. 572).

description: Amendment sought to increase funding by $30 million for the Byrne program; and offset this increase with a reduction in grants for reimbursing States for incarcerating criminal aliens.
purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 21, as amendment No. 4, to increase funding by $30 million for the Byrne program; and offsets this increase with a reduction in grants for reimbursing States for incarcerating criminal aliens.
